name: Impending Mystery
description:
DISCLAIMER - This game was created on a framework provided by Staffordshire university. Models/textures (except the lantern) + character, ledge grab, and melee mechanics were provided.

Impending Mystery is a project created for my studies at Staffordshire university to help build up my unreal skills by creating a level from a framework. Using what I learned from AD-99, I designed a level design that featured a downward spiral so the player would go down and down into the ruins. Alongside this were beatmaps to control the pace of the level and bubble maps that dictated what events would happen.

I decided to keep improving my environments and gameplay by using detailed lighting alongside UI, Audio, Cinematics, and particle effects.

This project alongside AD-99 gave me first-class honors in the 3-D Engines module at 86%

The heavily packed design document that highlights all of this is included in the game

ESC = Key Bindings
